Module.Content:
ChattyBarney's Website

Welcome to ChattyBarney's website! After Chattywebsite shut down, we are now both working on this website to collaborate and start fresh.

ChattyBarney's Website Update Log

New background, games, theme updates, and hover animations!

Custom HTML Code

This is a placeholder for your custom HTML code. Replace this content as needed.

Example:

Your HTML content here

READ THIS

This is a huge work in progress. If anything gets blocked, follow these steps:
Restart your device (Make sure the screen turns black, do power button + refresh key on Chromebook).
DON'T restore tabs, open this file again, and nothing should be blocked. If it's still blocked, play the games and apps because they can't be blocked.
Sorry for the yapping, thanks :D - British Man
